donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
This project assists Tanzania in the transformation of disaster management preparedness and response from ad hoc and partial approaches and capacity to stronger planning, coordination and institutional readiness. UNDP supports the implementation of the disaster management policy and the strengthening of institutional and coordination capacity of the Mainland Disaster Management Department.

UNDAP output: Operational framework and dialogue structure for implementation of Disaster Management Policies in Mainland in place.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
This project assists Zanzibar in the transformation of disaster management preparedness and response from ad hoc and partial approaches and capacity to stronger planning, coordination and institutional readiness. UNDP supports the implementation of the disaster management policy and the strengthening of institutional and coordination capacity of the Zanzibar Disaster Management Department.

UNDAP output: Operational framework and dialogue structure for implementation of  the Disaster Management Policy in Zanzibar in place.
